name: North Flying A/S
about: North Flying A/S is a premier aviation service provider based in Denmark, with a strong focus on flight safety and extensive experience. Established with over 20 years of expertise, particularly in air ambulance operations, North Flying operates a fleet of 10 fixed-wing aircraft, including Cessna Citation jets and Fairchild Metroliner turboprops. The company boasts a 24/7 operation office and its own maintenance facilities at Aalborg Airport. North Flying's highly specialized medical crew, comprising anaesthetists, aviation medicine specialists, and nurses, ensures top-notch medical evacuations. The company prioritizes safety, with all pilots undergoing rigorous training, and offers comprehensive services including aircraft management, air taxi, and charter flights. With a commitment to maintaining and developing expertise, North Flying continues to be a leading provider in Northern Europe.
